short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time_Print Client APP to Manage Public Use Computers in Public Libraries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Libshield Client Program for ChromeBook and Chromebox Computers - Includes Time and Print management for Chrome Devices in Public Libraries - To be used with Libdata Control Center Software. This will allow you to Time and Print manage your public use computers, by communicating with the management software and using IPP printing - This APP no longer uses Google Cloud print, but instead uses IPP printing directly to your Chrome device.

To add print management to your Chrome Device, you should add the Libdata Print Extension
